reviewText: A bit concerning at first because the default language is German (dubbed)! Just make sure you are familiar enough with your DVD player that you can navigate to the language option! Otherwise standard GREAT Monty Python entertainment and with some darkness...

It's a german release so all title screens for all movies are not in english, but they play on USA region blu ray players and include english audio.  Subtitles are not in english if that's an issue, skip it.  The case sleeve is very cool with pop up artwork.
